description: Perform medication reconciliation
description_ar: إجراء التوفيق الدوائي
implementation_guidance: Reconcile medications at admission transfer discharge. Compare current medications with new orders. Identify discrepancies. Resolve conflicts.

title: High-Risk Medications
description: Manage high-risk medications
description_ar: إدارة الأدوية عالية الخطورة
implementation_guidance: Identify high-alert medications. Store separately with clear labels. Require double-check before administration. Limit access. Monitor closely.

title: Medication Error Prevention
description: Prevent medication errors
description_ar: منع أخطاء الأدوية
implementation_guidance: Use computerized physician order entry (CPOE). Implement clinical decision support. Check drug interactions allergies. Verify high-risk medications.

title: Medication Safety
description: Ensure medication safety
description_ar: ضمان سلامة الأدوية
implementation_guidance: Implement five rights of medication: right patient drug dose route time. Verify before administration. Use barcode scanning. Document administration.

title: Identity Error Prevention
description: Prevent patient identity errors
description_ar: منع أخطاء هوية المريض
implementation_guidance: Verify identity before all procedures. Check ID band against order. Confirm with patient when conscious. Document verification.

title: Identification Bands
description: Use patient identification bands
description_ar: استخدام أساور التعريف
implementation_guidance: Apply ID bands to all patients on admission. Include name date of birth medical record number. Replace damaged bands. Verify band accuracy.

title: Patient Identification
description: Verify patient identity
description_ar: التحقق من هوية المريض
implementation_guidance: Use at least two patient identifiers. Verify identity before procedures medications specimen collection. Use patient ID bands.

title: Safety Policies
description: Establish patient safety policies
description_ar: وضع سياسات سلامة المرضى
implementation_guidance: Develop comprehensive safety policies. Cover medication safety infection prevention fall prevention. Review policies annually.

title: E-Prescribing
description: Secure electronic prescribing
description_ar: تأمين الوصفات الإلكترونية
implementation_guidance: Secure e-prescribing systems. Verify prescriber identity. Check drug interactions. Prevent prescription fraud. Track controlled substances.

title: Prescription Verification
description: Verify prescription authenticity
description_ar: التحقق من صحة الوصفات
implementation_guidance: Authenticate prescriptions. Verify prescriber credentials. Check prescription validity. Prevent prescription forgery. Monitor unusual patterns.

title: Genomic Data
description: Protect genomic data
description_ar: حماية البيانات الجينومية
implementation_guidance: Secure genetic information. Encrypt genomic data. Control access to genetic records. Maintain genomic privacy. Obtain specific consent.

title: Genomic Privacy
description: Ensure genomic privacy
description_ar: ضمان خصوصية البيانات الجينومية
implementation_guidance: Protect genetic privacy. Prevent genetic discrimination. Secure family genetic data. Control genetic data sharing. De-identify genetic information.

title: Medical Imaging Security
description: Secure medical imaging
description_ar: تأمين الصور الطبية
implementation_guidance: Secure DICOM images. Encrypt image storage and transmission. Control radiologist access. Maintain image integrity. Enable secure image sharing.

title: Image Archiving
description: Archive and manage medical images
description_ar: أرشفة وإدارة الصور الطبية
implementation_guidance: Implement PACS for image archiving. Ensure image quality. Enable long-term storage. Provide image retrieval. Backup medical images.

title: Surgical Safety
description: Ensure surgical safety
description_ar: ضمان سلامة الجراحة
implementation_guidance: Use WHO Surgical Safety Checklist. Perform time-out before incision. Verify correct patient procedure site. Count instruments and sponges. Mark surgical site.

title: Medical Billing Systems
description: Secure medical billing systems
description_ar: تأمين أنظمة الفوترة الطبية
implementation_guidance: Secure billing systems. Protect billing information. Prevent billing fraud. Ensure billing accuracy. Maintain billing records.

title: Health Systems Integration
description: Secure health systems integration
description_ar: تأمين تكامل النظم الصحية
implementation_guidance: Secure health IT integrations. Use secure APIs. Authenticate integrated systems. Encrypt integration data. Monitor integration points.

title: Medical APIs
description: Secure medical APIs
description_ar: تأمين واجهات برمجة التطبيقات الطبية
implementation_guidance: Secure healthcare APIs. Implement OAuth for health apps. Control API access to patient data. Rate limit API calls. Log API activity.

title: Emergency Access
description: Manage emergency access
description_ar: إدارة الوصول في حالات الطوارئ
implementation_guidance: Implement break-glass access for emergencies. Log all emergency access. Review emergency access post-event. Prevent abuse.

title: Emergency Systems
description: Ensure emergency system availability
description_ar: ضمان توفر أنظمة الطوارئ
implementation_guidance: Ensure 24/7 availability of critical clinical systems. Implement redundancy for emergency systems. Enable failover. Test emergency procedures.

title: Patient Safety Governance
description: Implement patient safety governance
description_ar: تطبيق حوكمة سلامة المرضى
implementation_guidance: Establish patient safety governance framework. Create patient safety committee. Define safety objectives. Assign safety responsibilities.

title: Safety Culture
description: Promote patient safety culture
description_ar: تعزيز ثقافة سلامة المرضى
implementation_guidance: Build just culture for safety reporting. Encourage error reporting without blame. Learn from incidents. Recognize safety champions.

title: Billing Privacy
description: Protect billing information privacy
description_ar: حماية خصوصية معلومات الفوترة
implementation_guidance: Protect patient billing privacy. Limit access to billing data. Secure payment information. Maintain billing confidentiality.

title: Medical Access Logs
description: Review medical data access logs
description_ar: مراجعة سجلات الوصول للبيانات الطبية
implementation_guidance: Review patient data access logs regularly. Detect unauthorized access. Investigate suspicious access. Report violations.

title: Pre-Surgical Verification
description: Verify before surgery
description_ar: التحقق قبل الجراحة
implementation_guidance: Conduct pre-surgical verification. Confirm patient identity. Verify surgical procedure and site. Check consent. Review imaging. Ensure equipment availability.

title: Surgical Site Marking
description: Mark surgical site
description_ar: وضع علامة الموقع الجراحي
implementation_guidance: Mark surgical site before procedure. Involve patient in marking. Use indelible marker. Mark correct side for laterality. Verify mark in OR.

title: Suicide Prevention
description: Prevent suicide
description_ar: منع الانتحار
implementation_guidance: Screen for suicide risk on admission. Implement suicide precautions for high-risk. Provide one-to-one observation when needed. Remove ligature points. Document interventions.

title: Mental Health Safety
description: Ensure mental health patient safety
description_ar: ضمان سلامة مرضى الصحة النفسية
implementation_guidance: Assess suicide risk. Implement safety precautions. Remove dangerous items. Provide close observation. Create therapeutic environment.

title: Neonatal Safety
description: Ensure neonatal safety
description_ar: ضمان سلامة حديثي الولادة
implementation_guidance: Identify newborns correctly. Prevent newborn abduction. Monitor for sepsis. Provide appropriate resuscitation. Ensure mother-baby matching.

title: Maternal Safety
description: Ensure maternal care safety
description_ar: ضمان سلامة رعاية الأمومة
implementation_guidance: Monitor obstetric patients closely. Recognize obstetric emergencies. Provide timely interventions. Prevent maternal hemorrhage. Ensure safe delivery.

title: Pediatric Dosing
description: Calculate pediatric doses
description_ar: حساب جرعات الأطفال
implementation_guidance: Use weight-based pediatric dosing. Verify calculations independently. Use pediatric-specific medication concentrations. Double-check high-risk medications. Document weight.

title: Pediatric Safety
description: Ensure pediatric patient safety
description_ar: ضمان سلامة المرضى الأطفال
implementation_guidance: Implement pediatric-specific safety measures. Use weight-based dosing. Provide age-appropriate equipment. Prevent abduction. Ensure child-safe environment.

title: Pain Assessment
description: Assess patient pain
description_ar: تقييم ألم المريض
implementation_guidance: Use age-appropriate pain scales. Ask about pain regularly. Observe for pain signs in non-verbal patients. Document pain assessment. Believe patient reports.

title: Pain Management
description: Manage patient pain
description_ar: إدارة ألم المريض
implementation_guidance: Assess pain regularly using pain scales. Provide pain relief. Reassess after intervention. Document pain scores. Address inadequate pain control.

title: Rapid Response Team
description: Activate rapid response team
description_ar: تفعيل فريق الاستجابة السريعة
implementation_guidance: Establish RRT for deteriorating patients. Define activation criteria. Respond within minutes. Provide immediate intervention. Review RRT calls.

title: Patient Deterioration
description: Detect patient deterioration
description_ar: كشف تدهور حالة المريض
implementation_guidance: Implement early warning scores (EWS/MEWS). Monitor vital signs regularly. Escalate concerning changes. Activate rapid response team. Document interventions.

title: Crash Carts
description: Manage crash carts
description_ar: إدارة عربات الطوارئ
implementation_guidance: Stock crash carts with emergency supplies. Check daily. Seal after checking. Replace after use. Track expiration dates.

title: Emergency Response
description: Respond to patient emergencies
description_ar: الاستجابة لطوارئ المرضى
implementation_guidance: Establish code blue system. Train staff in CPR/ACLS. Maintain crash carts. Ensure defibrillator availability. Conduct emergency drills.

title: Equipment Maintenance
description: Maintain medical equipment
description_ar: صيانة المعدات الطبية
implementation_guidance: Schedule regular equipment maintenance. Keep maintenance records. Calibrate equipment per manufacturer. Test safety features. Document maintenance.

title: Equipment Safety
description: Ensure medical equipment safety
description_ar: ضمان سلامة المعدات الطبية
implementation_guidance: Maintain medical equipment. Conduct preventive maintenance. Test equipment regularly. Remove defective equipment. Train staff on proper use.

title: Aspiration Risk
description: Prevent aspiration
description_ar: منع مخاطر الاختناق
implementation_guidance: Assess swallowing ability. Implement aspiration precautions. Position patients upright during feeding. Modify diet consistency. Monitor for aspiration signs.

title: Nutrition
description: Ensure proper nutrition
description_ar: ضمان التغذية السليمة
implementation_guidance: Assess nutritional status on admission. Identify malnutrition risk. Provide nutritional support. Monitor nutritional intake. Consult dietitian when needed.

title: Sentinel Events
description: Manage sentinel events
description_ar: إدارة الأحداث الحارسة
implementation_guidance: Identify sentinel events: unexpected death/injury. Conduct immediate investigation. Perform comprehensive RCA. Implement improvements. Report externally.

title: Pressure Ulcers
description: Prevent pressure ulcers
description_ar: منع قرح الضغط
implementation_guidance: Assess pressure ulcer risk. Implement prevention measures: repositioning special mattresses skin care. Monitor skin condition. Document interventions.

title: Pressure Ulcer Risk
description: Assess pressure ulcer risk
description_ar: تقييم خطر قرح الضغط
implementation_guidance: Use Braden Scale or similar tool. Assess on admission and daily for high-risk. Identify risk factors: immobility malnutrition moisture. Document scores.

title: Physical Restraints
description: Manage physical restraints
description_ar: إدارة تقييد الحركة
implementation_guidance: Use restraints only when necessary for safety. Obtain physician order. Monitor restrained patients frequently. Document rationale. Seek alternatives.

title: Restrained Patient Monitoring
description: Monitor restrained patients
description_ar: مراقبة المرضى المقيدين
implementation_guidance: Monitor every 15-30 minutes. Check circulation skin integrity comfort. Provide range of motion. Offer fluids toileting. Remove restraints when safe.

title: Blood Transfusion Safety
description: Ensure blood transfusion safety
description_ar: ضمان سلامة نقل الدم
implementation_guidance: Verify blood type compatibility. Use two-person verification. Check patient identity at bedside. Monitor for transfusion reactions. Document transfusion.

title: Blood Type Verification
description: Verify blood type
description_ar: التحقق من فصيلة الدم
implementation_guidance: Confirm blood type before transfusion. Match blood unit to patient. Use two identifiers. Verify ABO/Rh compatibility. Document verification.

title: Surgical Time-Out
description: Perform surgical time-out
description_ar: إجراء وقفة الأمان
implementation_guidance: Conduct time-out before incision. Involve entire surgical team. Verify patient procedure site laterality. Confirm antibiotic administration. Check allergies. Document time-out.

title: Informed Consent
description: Obtain informed consent
description_ar: الحصول على الموافقة المستنيرة
implementation_guidance: Obtain informed consent for procedures. Explain risks benefits alternatives. Ensure patient understanding. Document consent. Verify before procedure.

title: Care Handoff
description: Manage care handoffs
description_ar: إدارة تسليم الرعاية
implementation_guidance: Standardize handoff communication. Use SBAR (Situation Background Assessment Recommendation). Allow questions. Document handoff. Minimize interruptions.

title: Effective Communication
description: Ensure effective communication
description_ar: ضمان التواصل الفعال
implementation_guidance: Implement structured communication tools. Read back verbal orders. Clarify unclear information. Document critical conversations. Use closed-loop communication.

title: Incident Reporting
description: Report patient safety incidents
description_ar: الإبلاغ عن حوادث سلامة المرضى
implementation_guidance: Implement incident reporting system. Encourage all staff to report. Report near misses and actual events. Protect reporter confidentiality. Act on reports.

title: Incident Analysis
description: Analyze patient safety incidents
description_ar: تحليل حوادث سلامة المرضى
implementation_guidance: Analyze all reported incidents. Conduct root cause analysis for serious events. Identify contributing factors. Develop action plans. Track implementation.

title: Learning from Incidents
description: Learn from incidents
description_ar: التعلم من الحوادث
implementation_guidance: Share lessons learned from incidents. Implement system improvements. Communicate changes to staff. Monitor effectiveness. Prevent recurrence.

title: Adverse Events
description: Manage adverse events
description_ar: إدارة الأحداث السلبية
implementation_guidance: Define adverse events and near misses. Track adverse event rates. Investigate serious adverse events. Implement preventive measures. Report to MOH.

title: Consent Documentation
description: Document consent
description_ar: توثيق الموافقة
implementation_guidance: Document informed consent in medical record. Include date time provider patient signature. Specify procedure consented. Maintain consent forms.

title: Radiation Safety
description: Ensure radiation safety
description_ar: ضمان سلامة الإشعاع
implementation_guidance: Minimize radiation exposure. Use shielding. Follow ALARA principle. Monitor radiation doses. Protect pregnant patients. Train staff.

title: Health Systems Audit
description: Audit health systems security
description_ar: تدقيق أمن النظم الصحية
implementation_guidance: Conduct regular health IT security audits. Review access logs. Test security controls. Assess compliance. Implement findings.

title: Clinical Staff Training
description: Train staff on health information security
description_ar: تدريب الموظفين على أمن المعلومات الصحية
implementation_guidance: Train all clinical staff on patient privacy and data security. Cover HIPAA/local regulations. Conduct annual training. Test understanding.

title: Compliance
description: Ensure EMR compliance
description_ar: ضمان امتثال السجل الإلكتروني
implementation_guidance: Comply with MOH EMR requirements. Meet meaningful use criteria. Support quality reporting. Enable clinical research. Maintain certification.

title: EMR Governance
description: Implement EMR governance
description_ar: تطبيق حوكمة السجل الإلكتروني
implementation_guidance: Establish EMR governance committee. Define policies and standards. Approve system changes. Review system performance. Set strategic direction.

title: Updates
description: Manage system updates
description_ar: إدارة تحديثات النظام
implementation_guidance: Apply vendor updates regularly. Test updates in non-production. Plan update windows. Communicate changes. Monitor post-update.

title: Customization
description: Manage system customization
description_ar: إدارة تخصيص النظام
implementation_guidance: Control EMR customizations. Test before production. Document all changes. Avoid over-customization. Maintain upgradeability.

title: Interfaces
description: Manage interfaces
description_ar: إدارة الواجهات
implementation_guidance: Monitor interface status. Track message flow. Resolve interface errors. Test interfaces regularly. Document interface specifications.

title: Integration
description: Integrate with other systems
description_ar: تكامل مع الأنظمة الأخرى
implementation_guidance: Interface EMR with lab pharmacy radiology billing. Use HL7 messages. Enable bidirectional data flow. Maintain interface reliability.

title: Dashboards
description: Provide dashboards
description_ar: توفير لوحات المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Create clinical dashboards. Display key metrics. Enable drill-down. Provide real-time data. Support decision-making.

title: Analytics
description: Enable data analytics
description_ar: تفعيل تحليلات البيانات
implementation_guidance: Implement clinical analytics. Generate quality reports. Enable population health management. Provide dashboards. Support research.

title: Mobile Devices
description: Manage mobile devices
description_ar: إدارة الأجهزة المحمولة
implementation_guidance: Implement MDM for clinical devices. Enforce device encryption. Enable remote wipe. Control app installation. Monitor compliance.

title: Mobile Applications
description: Implement mobile applications
description_ar: تطبيق التطبيقات المحمولة
implementation_guidance: Provide mobile EMR access. Secure mobile apps. Enable offline functionality. Sync when online. Support BYOD policies.

title: Patient Engagement
description: Promote patient engagement
description_ar: تعزيز مشاركة المرضى
implementation_guidance: Encourage portal use. Educate patients on portal benefits. Provide portal training. Enable proxy access. Monitor portal adoption.

title: Patient Portal
description: Implement patient portal
description_ar: تطبيق بوابة المرضى
implementation_guidance: Deploy patient portal. Enable appointment scheduling. Provide lab/imaging results. Allow secure messaging. Offer medication refills.

title: Audit Trails
description: Maintain audit trails
description_ar: الحفاظ على سجلات التدقيق
implementation_guidance: Enable comprehensive audit logging. Log all data access and changes. Retain audit logs for 10 years. Protect logs from modification. Enable audit review.

title: System Audit
description: Audit EMR system
description_ar: تدقيق السجل الإلكتروني
implementation_guidance: Conduct regular EMR audits. Review system logs. Check access patterns. Verify data integrity. Assess compliance. Document findings.

title: Paper Records
description: Manage temporary paper records
description_ar: إدارة السجلات الورقية المؤقتة
implementation_guidance: Maintain downtime documentation supplies. Use standardized forms. Capture essential data. Enter into EMR after recovery. Reconcile records.

title: Downtime Procedures
description: Establish downtime procedures
description_ar: وضع إجراءات التعطل
implementation_guidance: Develop downtime protocols. Provide paper forms. Train staff on downtime procedures. Test downtime plan. Document workarounds.

title: User Support
description: Provide user support
description_ar: توفير دعم المستخدمين
implementation_guidance: Establish EMR help desk. Provide 24/7 support for clinical users. Resolve issues promptly. Track support tickets. Provide super-user support.

title: Progress Notes
description: Structure progress notes
description_ar: تنظيم الملاحظات السريرية
implementation_guidance: Use structured note format. Include assessment and plan. Document changes in condition. Time-stamp all notes. Enable co-signature.

title: Interoperability
description: Achieve interoperability
description_ar: تحقيق التشغيل البيني
implementation_guidance: Implement HL7/FHIR standards. Exchange data with other systems. Enable health information exchange. Share data with MOH. Support continuity of care.

title: Data Exchange
description: Enable data exchange
description_ar: تمكين تبادل البيانات
implementation_guidance: Send and receive clinical data. Support CCD/CCR formats. Enable patient summary sharing. Participate in regional HIE. Ensure secure exchange.

title: Access Controls
description: Implement access controls
description_ar: تطبيق ضوابط الوصول
implementation_guidance: Control EMR access by role. Implement role-based permissions. Use unique user IDs. Enforce strong authentication. Monitor access.

title: Access Logs
description: Review access logs
description_ar: مراجعة سجلات الوصول
implementation_guidance: Log all EMR access. Monitor for inappropriate access. Audit VIP/employee records. Investigate suspicious activity. Enforce sanctions.

title: EMR Security
description: Secure EMR system
description_ar: تأمين نظام السجل الطبي
implementation_guidance: Encrypt EMR data at rest and in transit. Implement firewalls. Use intrusion detection. Patch systems regularly. Conduct security assessments.

title: Certification
description: Maintain system certification
description_ar: الحفاظ على شهادات النظام
implementation_guidance: Achieve EMR certification. Maintain certified status. Meet certification criteria. Document compliance. Prepare for recertification.

title: Data Encryption
description: Encrypt medical data
description_ar: تشفير البيانات الطبية
implementation_guidance: Encrypt patient data end-to-end. Use AES-256 encryption. Encrypt backups. Protect encryption keys. Ensure secure transmission.

title: Data Recovery
description: Test data recovery
description_ar: اختبار استعادة البيانات
implementation_guidance: Test backup restoration monthly. Verify data integrity. Measure recovery time. Document test results. Ensure RPO/RTO compliance.

title: Availability
description: Ensure system availability
description_ar: ضمان توفر النظام
implementation_guidance: Maintain 99.9%+ uptime. Implement redundancy. Use load balancing. Enable failover. Monitor system health. Minimize downtime.

title: Disaster Recovery
description: Disaster recovery
description_ar: التعافي من الكوارث
implementation_guidance: Develop EMR disaster recovery plan. Define RTO (2-4 hours) and RPO (15 minutes). Maintain hot site. Test DR annually. Document procedures.

title: Performance
description: Monitor system performance
description_ar: مراقبة أداء النظام
implementation_guidance: Monitor EMR performance continuously. Track response times. Identify bottlenecks. Optimize slow queries. Ensure acceptable speed.

title: Optimization
description: Optimize system performance
description_ar: تحسين أداء النظام
implementation_guidance: Tune database performance. Optimize server resources. Archive old data. Clean up unused records. Maintain system efficiency.

title: Training
description: Provide system training
description_ar: توفير التدريب على النظام
implementation_guidance: Train all EMR users. Provide role-specific training. Offer hands-on practice. Test competency. Provide ongoing education.

title: Backup
description: Perform backups
description_ar: إجراء النسخ الاحتياطي
implementation_guidance: Backup EMR data daily. Store backups offsite. Encrypt backups. Test restoration regularly. Maintain backup logs. Ensure 24-hour recovery.

title: Privacy Awareness
description: Raise patient privacy awareness
description_ar: رفع الوعي بخصوصية المرضى
implementation_guidance: Raise awareness of patient privacy obligations. Share privacy policies. Communicate privacy incidents. Update on regulations.

title: Data Quality
description: Ensure data quality
description_ar: ضمان جودة البيانات
implementation_guidance: Monitor EMR data quality. Validate data accuracy. Implement data quality checks. Clean duplicate records. Maintain data integrity.

title: Health Systems Governance
description: Implement health information systems governance
description_ar: تطبيق حوكمة نظم المعلومات الصحية
implementation_guidance: Establish HIS governance framework. Define health IT strategy. Assign HIS responsibilities. Implement health IT policies.

title: Business Associate Agreements
description: Business associate agreements for health
description_ar: اتفاقيات شركاء الأعمال الصحيين
implementation_guidance: Execute BAAs with vendors accessing patient data. Define data protection obligations. Include breach notification requirements. Monitor vendor compliance.

title: Health System Vendors
description: Manage health system vendors
description_ar: إدارة موردي النظم الصحية
implementation_guidance: Assess vendor security. Include security requirements in contracts. Verify vendor compliance. Monitor vendor access to health data.

title: Medical Data Backup
description: Backup medical data
description_ar: النسخ الاحتياطي للبيانات الطبية
implementation_guidance: Backup patient data daily. Store backups offsite. Encrypt backups. Test restoration regularly. Maintain backup logs.

title: Healthcare Continuity
description: Ensure healthcare services continuity
description_ar: ضمان استمرارية الخدمات الصحية
implementation_guidance: Develop healthcare BCP. Define RTOs for critical systems (typically 2-4 hours). Maintain backup systems. Test failover. Enable patient care continuity.

title: Data De-identification
description: De-identify health data
description_ar: إخفاء هوية البيانات الصحية
implementation_guidance: De-identify patient data for secondary use. Remove direct identifiers. Apply k-anonymity or differential privacy. Prevent re-identification.

title: Medical Research
description: Medical research controls
description_ar: ضوابط البحث الطبي
implementation_guidance: Obtain ethics approval for research. Get informed consent from subjects. Anonymize research data. Protect research participant privacy.

title: Patient Notification
description: Notify patients of data breaches
description_ar: إخطار المرضى عند خرق البيانات
implementation_guidance: Notify patients of health data breaches within required timeframe. Explain breach impact. Provide remediation steps. Offer support services.

title: Health Data Incidents
description: Respond to health data incidents
description_ar: الاستجابة لحوادث البيانات الصحية
implementation_guidance: Develop health data breach response plan. Notify affected patients. Report to MOH. Investigate incidents. Remediate vulnerabilities.

title: Medical Mobile Devices
description: Manage medical mobile devices
description_ar: إدارة الأجهزة المحمولة الطبية
implementation_guidance: Implement MDM for clinical devices. Encrypt mobile devices. Enable remote wipe. Control app installation. Monitor device compliance.

title: Mobile Health Apps
description: Secure mobile health applications
description_ar: تأمين تطبيقات الصحة المحمولة
implementation_guidance: Secure mHealth apps. Encrypt health data on devices. Implement app authentication. Control app permissions. Test app security.

title: Teleconsultation Privacy
description: Ensure teleconsultation privacy
description_ar: ضمان خصوصية الاستشارة عن بعد
implementation_guidance: Protect virtual consultation privacy. Use secure communication platforms. Prevent unauthorized access to sessions. Document informed consent.

title: Telemedicine
description: Secure telemedicine services
description_ar: تأمين خدمات الطب عن بعد
implementation_guidance: Secure telehealth platforms. Encrypt video consultations. Verify patient identity. Maintain teleconsultation records. Ensure privacy.

title: Connected Medical Devices
description: Secure connected medical devices
description_ar: تأمين الأجهزة الطبية المتصلة
implementation_guidance: Secure IoMT devices. Segment medical device network. Monitor device activity. Patch medical devices. Inventory all devices.

title: Pharmacy Systems
description: Secure pharmacy information systems
description_ar: تأمين أنظمة الصيدلية
implementation_guidance: Secure pharmacy systems. Prevent medication errors. Check drug interactions. Track controlled substances. Verify prescriptions.

title: Radiology Systems
description: Secure radiology information systems
description_ar: تأمين أنظمة الأشعة
implementation_guidance: Secure RIS and PACS. Protect medical images. Implement DICOM standards. Enable image sharing. Control radiologist access.

title: Laboratory Systems
description: Secure laboratory information systems
description_ar: تأمين أنظمة المختبرات
implementation_guidance: Secure LIS. Validate lab results. Interface with EMR. Maintain lab data integrity. Control access to lab systems.

title: Health Information Exchange
description: Enable health information exchange
description_ar: تمكين تبادل المعلومات الصحية
implementation_guidance: Facilitate secure health data exchange. Obtain patient consent for sharing. Encrypt data in transit. Log all exchanges.

title: HIS Strategy

description_ar: تحديد استراتيجية نظم المعلومات الصحية
implementation_guidance: Develop HIS strategy aligned with healthcare objectives. Plan digital health transformation. Define interoperability goals. Budget for health IT.

title: Patient Data Protection
description: Protect patient data
description_ar: حماية بيانات المرضى
implementation_guidance: Implement strong patient data protection. Encrypt patient records. Control access to medical information. Maintain patient confidentiality.

title: Medical Information Confidentiality
description: Ensure medical information confidentiality
description_ar: ضمان سرية المعلومات الطبية
implementation_guidance: Protect patient privacy. Implement confidentiality safeguards. Train staff on patient privacy. Monitor privacy compliance.

title: Patient Consent
description: Obtain patient consent
description_ar: الحصول على موافقة المريض
implementation_guidance: Obtain patient consent for data collection use sharing. Document consent. Honor patient preferences. Enable consent withdrawal.

title: Patient Rights
description: Enable patient rights
description_ar: تمكين حقوق المريض
implementation_guidance: Enable patient access to medical records. Allow data correction. Provide data portability. Support right to be forgotten where applicable.

title: Electronic Medical Records

description_ar: تطبيق السجلات الطبية الإلكترونية
implementation_guidance: Deploy EMR system. Ensure EMR completeness and accuracy. Enable clinical decision support. Maintain audit trails.

title: Data Completeness
description: Ensure data completeness
description_ar: ضمان اكتمال البيانات
implementation_guidance: Monitor documentation completeness. Require required fields. Track missing data. Report completeness metrics. Improve data capture.

title: Medical Data Quality
description: Ensure medical data quality
description_ar: ضمان جودة البيانات الطبية
implementation_guidance: Validate medical data accuracy. Implement data quality checks. Standardize medical terminologies. Correct data errors promptly.

title: Medical Record Retention
description: Retain medical records
description_ar: الاحتفاظ بالسجلات الطبية
implementation_guidance: Retain patient records per MOH requirements (typically 10-25 years). Store securely. Enable retrieval. Archive inactive records.

implementation_guidance: Control access to patient information based on role. Implement break-glass access for emergencies. Log all access. Review access regularly.

implementation_guidance: Require strong authentication for health systems. Use biometrics or smart cards for clinical staff. Implement MFA. Disable inactive accounts.

description_ar: تمكين التشغيل البيني للنظم الصحية
implementation_guidance: Implement health information exchange. Use HL7 FHIR standards. Enable data sharing between facilities. Maintain interoperability.

implementation_guidance: Protect medical records from tampering. Implement digital signatures. Maintain version control. Log all record modifications.

implementation_guidance: Justify all imaging. Use lowest necessary dose. Shield non-targeted areas. Screen for pregnancy. Document radiation exposure.

title: Demolition

title: Food Safety

implementation_guidance: Ensure food safety. Prevent contamination. Maintain cold chain. Monitor temperatures. Conduct inspections.

title: Recycling

description_ar: برامج إعادة التدوير

title: Waste Management

title: Parking Management
description: Manage parking
description_ar: إدارة مواقف السيارات

title: Parking
description: Provide parking

title: Advertising
description: Outdoor advertising regulation
description_ar: تنظيم الإعلانات الخارجية
implementation_guidance: Regulate outdoor advertising. Obtain advertising permit. Follow placement rules. Maintain appropriateness. Comply with standards.

title: Signage
description: Signage regulation
description_ar: تنظيم اللافتات
implementation_guidance: Obtain permit for signage. Follow size restrictions. Use approved materials. Maintain signs. Remove unauthorized signs.

title: Business Activities

description_ar: تنظيم الأنشطة التجارية

title: Commercial Licenses

title: Sanitation
description: Sanitation systems
description_ar: أنظمة الصرف الصحي
implementation_guidance: Implement sanitation systems. Connect to sewage. Manage wastewater. Prevent contamination. Maintain systems.

title: Public Health
description: Public health standards
description_ar: معايير الصحة العامة
implementation_guidance: Maintain public health standards. Ensure sanitation. Control pests. Manage waste. Maintain hygiene.

title: Violations
description: Address municipal violations
description_ar: معالجة المخالفات البلدية
implementation_guidance: Address municipal violations promptly. Investigate causes. Implement corrections. Prevent recurrence. Pay fines.

title: Inspections
description: Municipal inspection readiness
description_ar: الاستعداد لتفتيش البلدية
implementation_guidance: Prepare for municipal inspections. Maintain compliance. Address violations. Document corrections. Pass inspections.

title: Fire Safety
description: Fire protection systems
description_ar: أنظمة الحماية من الحريق
implementation_guidance: Install fire protection systems. Provide fire alarms. Install sprinklers. Ensure fire exits. Maintain systems.

title: Safety
description: Building safety
description_ar: سلامة المباني
implementation_guidance: Ensure building safety. Install fire safety systems. Provide emergency exits. Meet structural safety. Conduct inspections.

title: Outpatient Quality
description: Ensure outpatient quality
description_ar: ضمان جودة العيادات الخارجية
implementation_guidance: Monitor clinic wait times. Track appointment availability. Measure patient satisfaction. Improve access. Enhance clinic operations.

title: Service Access
description: Improve service access
description_ar: تحسين الوصول للخدمات
implementation_guidance: Reduce time to appointment. Offer online scheduling. Extend clinic hours. Provide multiple access points. Monitor access metrics.

title: Care Transitions
description: Improve care transitions
description_ar: تحسين انتقالات الرعاية
implementation_guidance: Standardize transitions between care settings. Improve handoffs. Ensure information transfer. Coordinate follow-up. Reduce transition-related errors.

title: Inter-Department Coordination
description: Coordinate between departments

implementation_guidance: Facilitate inter-departmental communication. Define handoff processes. Use structured communication. Ensure continuity. Prevent gaps in care.

description: Engage staff in quality

implementation_guidance: Involve frontline staff in improvement. Seek staff input. Empower staff. Provide quality training. Recognize contributions.

title: Demolition Safety
description: Demolition safety
description_ar: سلامة عمليات الهدم
implementation_guidance: Ensure demolition safety. Secure area. Protect public. Control dust. Prevent hazards.

implementation_guidance: Educate patients about conditions and treatments. Provide written materials. Use teach-back method. Assess health literacy. Document education.

title: Improvement Sustainability
description: Sustain improvements

implementation_guidance: Sustain quality improvements. Monitor improvement over time. Prevent regression. Hardwire changes. Spread improvements.

implementation_guidance: Identify successful improvements. Adapt to other areas. Share best practices internally. Scale improvements. Replicate successes.

title: Building Permits
description: Obtain building permit
description_ar: الحصول على ترخيص بناء
implementation_guidance: Obtain building permit from municipality before construction. Submit plans. Meet requirements. Pay fees. Display permit.

title: License Renewal
description: Renew municipal licenses
description_ar: تجديد التراخيص البلدية
implementation_guidance: Renew municipal licenses before expiry. Submit renewal application. Update information. Pay renewal fees. Maintain valid license.

title: Building Code
description: Comply with Saudi Building Code
description_ar: الامتثال لكود البناء السعودي
implementation_guidance: Comply with Saudi Building Code (SBC). Follow structural requirements. Meet safety standards. Use approved materials. Document compliance.

title: Specifications
description: Technical specifications
description_ar: المواصفات الفنية
implementation_guidance: Meet technical specifications. Follow design standards. Implement proper construction. Use quality materials. Ensure workmanship.

title: Health Literacy
description: Address health literacy
description_ar: معالجة محو الأمية الصحية
implementation_guidance: Assess patient health literacy. Use plain language. Provide visual aids. Ensure understanding. Adapt communication to literacy level.

title: Surgical Complications
description: Monitor surgical complications
description_ar: مراقبة مضاعفات الجراحة
implementation_guidance: Track surgical site infections. Monitor postoperative complications. Analyze complication causes. Implement prevention. Reduce complication rates.

title: Excavation
description: Excavation permits
description_ar: تصاريح الحفر
implementation_guidance: Obtain excavation permit. Mark utilities. Ensure safety. Protect public. Restore area.

title: Trees
description: Protect trees and green spaces
description_ar: حماية الأشجار والمساحات الخضراء
implementation_guidance: Protect trees and vegetation. Obtain permit for removal. Plant replacements. Maintain green spaces. Support beautification.

title: Risk Assessment
description: Conduct risk assessment periodically
description_ar: إجراء تقييم المخاطر بشكل دوري
implementation_guidance: Perform annual risk assessments. Identify assets threats vulnerabilities. Calculate risk levels. Prioritize treatment.

title: Management Contact
description: Report information security status to top management
description_ar: إبلاغ الإدارة العليا بحالة أمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Provide quarterly security reports to board. Cover incidents metrics risks. Obtain management decisions.

title: Segregation of Duties
description: Implement segregation of duties for sensitive functions
description_ar: تطبيق مبدأ الفصل بين الواجبات للوظائف الحساسة
implementation_guidance: Identify conflicting duties. Separate incompatible functions. Implement dual control for critical operations.

title: Roles and Responsibilities
description: Define and document information security roles and responsibilities
description_ar: تحديد وتوثيق أدوار ومسؤوليات أمن المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Define security roles: CISO security team system owners. Document responsibilities. Assign accountabilities.

title: Policy Review
description: Review information security policy annually or upon major changes
description_ar: مراجعة سياسة أمن المعلومات سنوياً أو عند التغييرات الجوهرية
implementation_guidance: Schedule annual policy reviews. Review after significant changes. Update as needed. Document reviews.

title: Information Security Policy
description: Establish and document information security policy approved by top management
description_ar: وضع وتوثيق سياسة أمن المعلومات المعتمدة من الإدارة العليا
implementation_guidance: Develop comprehensive information security policy. Obtain executive approval. Publish and communicate organization-wide.

title: Updates
description: Information updates
description_ar: تحديث المعلومات
implementation_guidance: Update municipal information. Report ownership changes. Update contact details. Notify modifications. Keep current.

title: Reporting
description: Municipal reporting
description_ar: التقارير للبلدية
implementation_guidance: Report to municipality as required. Submit required information. Notify of changes. Respond to requests. Maintain communication.

title: Documentation
description: Municipal documentation
description_ar: التوثيق البلدي
implementation_guidance: Document municipal compliance. Maintain certificates. Keep correspondence. Document changes. Organize files.

title: Records
description: Maintain records
description_ar: الاحتفاظ بالسجلات
implementation_guidance: Maintain municipal records. Keep permits and approvals. Retain inspection reports. Store for required period. Enable retrieval.

title: Emergency Response
description: Emergency cooperation
description_ar: التعاون في الطوارئ
implementation_guidance: Cooperate in emergencies. Provide access. Share information. Support responders. Follow instructions.

title: Emergency Access
description: Emergency access
description_ar: الوصول في الطوارئ
implementation_guidance: Provide emergency access. Ensure fire truck access. Maintain clear routes. Mark access points. Enable response.

title: Service Charges
description: Service charges
description_ar: رسوم الخدمات
implementation_guidance: Pay service charges. Pay utility fees. Pay waste collection. Pay cleaning fees. Settle regularly.

title: Fees
description: Pay municipal fees
description_ar: دفع الرسوم البلدية
implementation_guidance: Pay all municipal fees. Pay permit fees. Pay inspection fees. Pay service charges. Obtain receipts.

title: Boundaries
description: Boundary determination
description_ar: تحديد الحدود
implementation_guidance: Determine property boundaries. Survey accurately. Mark boundaries. Resolve disputes. Document boundaries.

title: Surveys
description: Survey and subdivision
description_ar: المسح والتقسيم
implementation_guidance: Conduct land surveys. Hire licensed surveyors. Submit survey plans. Obtain subdivision approval. Register boundaries.

title: Land Use
description: Land use
description_ar: استخدام الأراضي
implementation_guidance: Use land per zoning. Conduct permitted activities. Don't violate use. Obtain approvals. Maintain compliance.

title: Landscaping
description: Landscaping requirements
description_ar: متطلبات التشجير
implementation_guidance: Meet landscaping requirements. Provide green areas. Use native plants. Maintain landscapes. Ensure irrigation.

title: Noise
description: Noise controls
description_ar: ضوابط الضوضاء
implementation_guidance: Control noise levels. Comply with noise limits. Restrict construction hours. Minimize disturbance. Address complaints.

title: Working Hours
description: Permitted working hours
description_ar: ساعات العمل المسموحة
implementation_guidance: Follow permitted working hours. Restrict noisy activities. Respect quiet hours. Obtain special permits. Minimize impact.

title: Occupancy Certificate
description: Obtain occupancy certificate
description_ar: الحصول على شهادة الإشغال
implementation_guidance: Obtain occupancy certificate before use. Complete construction. Pass final inspection. Meet requirements. Maintain certificate.

title: Occupancy Requirements
description: Occupancy requirements
description_ar: متطلبات الإشغال
implementation_guidance: Meet occupancy requirements. Comply with capacity limits. Ensure safety. Provide facilities. Maintain standards.

title: Maintenance
description: Building maintenance
description_ar: صيانة المباني
implementation_guidance: Maintain buildings properly. Conduct regular maintenance. Address defects. Ensure safety. Keep records.

title: Restoration
description: Excavation restoration
description_ar: ترميم الحفريات
implementation_guidance: Restore excavated areas. Repair damage. Return to original condition. Complete promptly. Obtain approval.

title: Repairs
description: Building repairs
description_ar: إصلاحات المباني
implementation_guidance: Repair buildings promptly. Address structural issues. Fix safety hazards. Obtain permits. Document repairs.

title: Accessible Facilities
description: Accessible facilities
description_ar: المرافق الميسرة
implementation_guidance: Provide accessible facilities. Install accessible restrooms. Ensure door widths. Provide handrails. Meet standards.

title: Utilities
description: Utility connections
description_ar: توصيل المرافق
implementation_guidance: Connect to municipal utilities. Obtain water connection. Connect electricity. Install sewage. Pay utility fees.

description: This control ensures proper monitoring & logging implementation and monitoring for organizational security.
description_ar: يضمن هذا التحكم التنفيذ السليم والمراقبة لMonitoring & Logging من أجل أمن المنظمة.
implementation_guidance: Follow industry best practices for monitoring & logging and ensure regular review and updates.
implementation_guidance_ar: اتبع أفضل الممارسات الصناعية لMonitoring & Logging وضمان المراجعة والتحديثات المنتظمة.
